title: Throne Room in Palace of Minos
description: The Throne Room in the "Palace of Minos" at Knossos, a room with ritual features located on the west side of the central courtyard of the palace. The room takes its name from the masonry throne, flanked by frescoes depicting griffins, that occupies one of its walls.

properties.description: Location of the Throne Room in the "Palace of Minos", determined by the comparison of satellite imagery with published plans.
properties.title: Imagery location of Throne Room in "Palace of Minos"
